element.name: Main Olfactory Bulb
element.notes: generate spatiotemporal neural code, in=glomeruli -> 1000x1 -> out=mitral

element.name: Basolateral Nuclear Complex
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Basolateral_nuclear_complex Basolateral nuclear complex]; NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_amygdaloid_area Anterior amygdaloid area]

element.name: Lateral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.function: plasticity, conditional (neutral stimulus) to specific (taste, smell, visceral) unconditional (positive or negative stimulus) association
element.notes: sensory interface of amygdala during emotional learning; inferior cells retain memory

element.name: Dorsolateral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.function: conditional stimulus input - high-aggregated visual, auditory and somatic, patterns of perception

element.name: Ventrolateral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.function: unconditional stimulus input - visual, auditory and somatic, convergence from thalamus
element.notes: LA1; LGN, MGBm, PIL

element.name: Ventromedial Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.function: conditional and unconditional convergence to affect polymodal memory formation
element.notes: LA3; projects to ET

element.name: Basal Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.function: enhance explicit memories in hippocampus about emotional situations
element.notes: conditioned fear expression and extinction

element.name: Parvicellular Basal Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Lateral part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]
element.function: enhance explicit memories in hippocampus about emotional situations

element.name: Magnocellular Basal Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_basal_amygdaloid_nucleus Medial part of basal amygdaloid nucleus]
element.function: enhance emotional memories memories in medial prefrontal cortex

element.name: Accessory Basal Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.notes: proections to matrix of core of NACC

element.name: Centromedial Nuclei
element.notes: evolutionarily primitive division

element.name: Central Amygdala
element.function: mediate behavioral responses, link to general aspects of reinforcement; responses to fear stimuli; directing attention and behaviors when salience of competing stimuli is in flux
element.notes: controls emotional reactions and physiological responses via connections to brainstem

element.name: Central Amygdaloid Nucleus, capsular subdivision
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Lateral central nucleus of the amygdala]
element.function: mediate behavioral responses, link to striatal effect
element.notes: gustatory, somatosensory, visual, auditory, frontal cortex, perirhinal cortex, ET, SUB -> X -> HT-dl/cl, CeM

element.name: Central Amygdaloid Nucleus, lateral subdivision
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Lateral central nucleus of the amygdala]
element.function: mediate behavioral responses, link to gustatory and visceral aspects of reinforcement
element.notes: contributions of food prediction and food presentation

element.name: Medial Central Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_central_nucleus_of_the_amygdala Medial central nucleus of the amygdala]

element.name: Medial Amygdala
element.notes: olfactory processing and innate emotions

element.name: Medial Posteror Dorsal Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.notes: MePD -> HT-MPN

element.name: Medial Posteror Ventral Amygdaloid Nucleus
element.notes: MePV -> LAC.FD.HT.VM (reproductive+defensive), LAC.FD.HT.AH (defensive)

element.name: Septal Nucleus
element.function: Inhibition of fear and expression of pleasurable responses

element.name: Lateral Septal Group
element.notes: from precommissural fornix to/from MFB

element.name: Septohippocampal Nucleus
element.function: participate in solving conflict between two or more competing goals, defensive circuit

element.name: Medial Septal Group
element.notes: ACh and GABA; major cholinergic input to HC

element.name: Medial Septal Nucleus
element.function: affect HC for spatial learning, generation of theta waves
element.notes: output nucleus; projections from AM and HC overlap; control theta rythm and exprolatory behavior; from/to MFB to fornix fimbria

element.name: Diagonal Band of Broca
element.function: involved in generation of theta waves in hippocampus
element.notes: ACh and GABA; ventral group - from stria terminalis to/from MFB

element.name: Posterior Septal Group
element.notes: from MFB to stria medullaris

element.name: Septofimbrial Nucleus
element.function: afferent to medial habenula, primary input to indirect encoding negative feedback

element.name: Triangular Septal Nucleus
element.function: afferent to medial habenula, interpeduncular nucleus

element.name: Endopiriform Nucleus
element.function: Putative relay of limbic-associated cortical-like areas subserving affective information

element.name: Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
element.function: Mediate slow longer-lasting responses that accompany sustained threats
element.notes: Major output from AM to HT, part of extended amygdala; medial part continues to medial AM, central part continues to central AM

element.name: Oval Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Bed_nuclei_of_the_stria_terminalis_oval_nucleus Bed nuclei of the stria terminalis oval nucleus]

element.name: Lateral Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
Medial Bed Nucleus of Stria Terminalis
Basal Nucleus of Meynert
element.notes: ACh source, attention; modulatory nucleus

element.name: Interstitial Anterior Commissural Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Interstitial_nucleus_of_the_posterior_limb_of_the_anterior_commissure Interstitial nucleus of the posterior limb of the anterior commissure]
element.notes: Related to the central extended amygdala, no connections between MED and LT; both medial and lateral divisions innervate retrorubral field

element.name: Medial Interstitial Anterior Commissural Nucleus
element.notes: reciprocate its afferent connections, similar to medial part of central amygdaloid nucleus; projections to AM-Ce/BNST components, PB, and SOL originate chiefly from medial division; strong ACh projections from caudal IPACm to AM-BL-posterior and amygdalopiriform transition area

element.name: Lateral Interstitial Anterior Commissural Nucleus
element.notes: innervates the pallidal complex, substantia nigra and retrorubral field

element.name: Ventral Striatum
element.notes: NACC (OMPFC, ACC), NACC/PU-ventral (Rostral cortex, IT, PH cortex)

element.name: Accumbens Nucleus
element.function: Activate motor functions under attention, expectation of pleasure; rhythmic timing
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Nucleus Accumbens Core
element.function: cognitive processing of motor function related to reward and reinforcement; encodes new motor programs which facilitate acquisition of given reward in future

element.name: Nucleus Accumbens Shell
element.function: cognitive processing of motivational salience (wanting) as well as reward and reinforcement effects

element.name: Ventral Putamen
element.function: Evaluation of flavors, taste, motivation loop

element.name: Dorsal Striatum
element.notes: PU-dorsal (sensorimotor cortex, partietal cortex), CN-dorsal (prefrontal, PPC, STC)

element.name: Caudate Nucleus
element.function: Excitation of correct action schemas and selection of appropriate sub-goals based on evaluation of action-outcomes
element.notes: One of neural correlates of romantic love; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Caudate Nucleus Head
element.function: Feedback processing, result of incorrect categorization
element.notes: LPFC, BA 9

element.name: Caudate Nucleus Body
element.notes: FEF, SEF

element.name: Caudate Nucleus Tail
element.notes: ITC, STC

element.name: Dorsal Putamen
element.notes: Regulate movements and influence various types of learning; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Dorsal Putamen Lateral
element.notes: ventrolateral, D1 receptor, MC and S1 - overlap, TH/CM from GPi; DL-leg, RL-face, VM-arms

element.name: Dorsal Putamen Medial
element.notes: dorsomedial, SMC and PMC - overlap, BA 6,46

element.name: Globus Pallidus External
element.function: Regulate and focus activity patterns in striatum, STN, GPi, and SNpr
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Globus Pallidus External Medial
element.notes: Body extensor movements, trunk and girdles

element.name: Globus Pallidus Internal
element.function: Output nuclei of basal ganglia to neocortex
element.notes: Balance of direct and indirect paths, GPM; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Globus Pallidus Internal Lateral
element.notes: output nuclei of basal ganglia to neocortex, leg, arm, face; lateral - leg, medial - arm, ventral - face

element.name: Globus Pallidus Internal Medial
element.notes: indirect path

element.name: Globus Pallidus Internal Dorsal
element.notes: output nucleus for caudate nucleus

element.name: Ventral Pallidum
element.notes: Necessary for reward learning and performance; inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Substantia Nigra Pars Compacta
element.notes: Supply striatum with dopamine, input to Basal Ganglia

element.name: Substantia Nigra Pars Reticulata
element.function: Convey final processed signals of basal ganglia to thalamus and superior colliculus
element.notes: inhibitory nucleus

element.name: Hippocampus
element.notes: CA4=DG.deep,Ventromedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus - Mediate dynamic regulation of pattern separation in the dentate gyrus

element.name: Dentate Gyrus
element.function: Distinguishing multiple instances of similar events

element.name: Ventrolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - long-term

element.name: Dorsolateral Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Gate controlled by the activity of the supramammillary nucleus to control signal propagation between HC lamines
element.notes: Hippocampus. Receives theta rithm input from Septum Nucleus; the only SUM projection in rat, the only converge from ET L2 and L3; social memory

element.name: Dorsomedial Cornu Ammonis of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory - short-term

element.name: Proximal CA1 of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory, spatial

element.name: Middle CA1 of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory, synchronize

element.name: Distal CA1 of Hippocampus
element.function: Representing sequences of episodic memory, motivational

element.name: Lateral Habenula
element.function: Encoding negative feedback, direct; motivational control of behavior; pain processing, reward, motivation, and learning
element.notes: regulation of 5HT, NE

element.name: Medial Habenula
element.notes: affects VTA, dorsal raphe but via interpeduncular nucleus

element.name: Lateral Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Generate theta rythm and relay to HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.name: Medial Mammillary Nucleus
element.function: Relay for impulses coming from AM and HC
element.notes: Memory, recognition, spatial awareness, and interpreting the context of events

element.name: Mediolateral Mammillary Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Lateral part of medial mammillary nucleus]

element.name: Medial Part of Medial Mammillary Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_medial_mammillary_nucleus Medial part of medial mammillary nucleus]

element.name: Preoptic Nucleus
element.function: Regulates release of gonadotropic hormones, sexual differentiation

element.name: Medial Preoptic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_preoptic_nucleus Medial preoptic nucleus];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Median_preoptic_nucleus Median preoptic nucleus];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_preoptic_region Medial preoptic region]

element.name: Medial Part of Medial Preoptic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_the_medial_preoptic_nucleus Medial part of the medial preoptic nucleus]

element.name: Supraoptic Nucleus
element.function: Blood volume or blood pressure, vasopressin release

element.name: Principal Anterior Division of Supraoptic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Principal_anterior_division_of_supraoptic_nucleus Principal anterior division of supraoptic nucleus]

element.name: Tuberal Area
element.notes: Sole source of histamine

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_hypothalamus Paraventricular nucleus of hypothalamus];NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_hypothalamic_region Paraventricular hypothalamic region]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division - Anterior Magnocellular Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division_-_anterior_magnocellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division - anterior magnocellular part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division - Medial Magnocellular Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division_-_medial_magnocellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division - medial magnocellular part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division - Posterior Magnocellular Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division_-_posterior_magnocellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division - posterior magnocellular part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division - Posterior Magnocellular Part Lateral Zone
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division_-_posterior_magnocellular_part_lateral_zone Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division - posterior magnocellular part lateral zone]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Magnocellular Division - Posterior Magnocellular Part Medial Zone
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_magnocellular_division_-_posterior_magnocellular_part_medial_zone Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus magnocellular division - posterior magnocellular part medial zone]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Parvicellular Division
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_parvicellular_division Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus parvicellular division]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Descending Division
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Descending Division - Dorsal Parvicellular Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division_-_dorsal_parvicellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division - dorsal parvicellular part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Descending Division - Forniceal Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division_-_forniceal_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division - forniceal part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Descending Division - Lateral Parvicellular Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division_-_lateral_parvicellular_part Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division - lateral parvicellular part]

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Hypothalamus Descending Division - Medial Parvicellular Part, Ventral Zone
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paraventricular_nucleus_of_the_hypothalamus_descending_division_-_medial_parvicellular_part,_ventral_zone Paraventricular nucleus of the hypothalamus descending division - medial parvicellular part, ventral zone]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Anterior Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_anterior_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus anterior part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Central Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_central_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus central part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Dorsal Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_dorsal_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus dorsal part]

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Hypothalamus Posterior Part
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterior_nucleus_of_hypothalamus_posterior_part Anterior nucleus of hypothalamus posterior part]

element.name: Ventromedial Hypothalamic Nucleus
element.notes: medial of tuberculum

element.name: Arcuate Nucleus of Hypothalamus
element.function: Regulation of growth, appetite and body weight
element.notes: lateral of tuberlulum, TIDA - releases dopamine to regulate secretion of prolactin hormone, GHRH - stimulate growth hormone secretion (ventrolateral)

element.name: Lateral Hypothalamic Nucleus
element.notes: lesions - lack of appetite

element.name: Supramammillary Nucleus
element.function: control hippocampal plasticity, determine frequency of hippocampal theta rhythm

element.name: Tuberomammillary Nucleus
element.function: sole source of histamine in the brain
element.notes: regulate sleep, helps produce responses to sexual stimuli, and helps body respond to stressful situations

element.name: Premammillary Nucleus
element.function: expression of fear responses to environmental threats
element.notes: integrate information involved in spatial working memory, which may result in attentional mechanisms on selection of appropriate escape strategies

element.name: Anteroventral Periventricular Nucleus
element.notes: Abundant of nuclear hormone receptors, sexual differentiation

element.name: Intermediate Periventrical Nucleus
element.notes: Produce regulatory hormones

element.name: Retina
element.function: Spatial decorrelation through center surround inhibition
element.notes: 100:1 cones/rods to ganglion cells aggregation, edge extraction

element.name: Subthalamus Area
element.notes: Dysfunction increases impulsivity in case of two equally rewarded stimuli

element.name: Nucleus of Forel Field
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Nucleus_of_field_H_of_Forel Nucleus of field H of Forel]

element.name: Lateral Geniculate Nucleus
element.notes: Only 10% of inputs to LGN come from the retina. 90% are modulatory inputs from cortex and the brainstem

element.name: Dorsolateral Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Dorsal_nucleus_of_lateral_geniculate_body Dorsal nucleus of lateral geniculate body]

element.name: Intergeniculate Leaflet of Lateral Geniculate Complex
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Intergeniculate_leaflet_of_the_lateral_geniculate_complex Intergeniculate leaflet of the lateral geniculate complex]

element.name: Ventrolateral Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Ventral_nucleus_of_lateral_geniculate_body Ventral nucleus of lateral geniculate body]

element.name: Medial Geniculate Body
element.function: Detection of the relative intensity and duration of a sound, relay to Auditory Cortex

element.name: Anterodorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Anterodorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Anterodorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Dorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Dorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Dorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Magnocellular Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Magnocellular nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Medial Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Medial nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Posterodorsal Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Posterodorsal_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Posterodorsal nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Ventral Nucleus of Medial Geniculate Body
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Ventral_nucleus_of_medial_geniculate_body Ventral nucleus of medial geniculate body]

element.name: Medial Pulvinar
element.function: Integration of associative cortical information and projects to visuomotor-related cortex
element.notes: CG, PMC, PFC connections

element.name: Oral Pulvinar
element.notes: Thalamus, connected with parietal cortex, anterior pulvinar

element.name: Anterior Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projects to L4 of presubiculum and receives from postsubiculum, also to CG, RSP; spatial learning and memory; attentional processes; head direction

element.name: Anteroventral Nucleus
element.function: return loop to convey theta to to HF, attentional processes

element.name: Anterodorsal Nucleus
element.function: head direction, spatial learning and memory

element.name: Intralaminar and Midline Nuclei of Thalamus
Intralaminar Nuclear Group of Thalamus
element.function: Projects from SC LVII,LVIII and Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus to striatum

element.name: Rostral Intralaminar Nuclear Group of Thalamus
element.notes: from SC LVII,LVIII/CR nuclei to striatum

element.name: Caudal Intralaminar Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: from brainstem to SPL.SA, CM, CL, CeM, PC; from GPi, Spinal Trigeminal Nucleus to striatum

element.name: Centromedian Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Control of level of cortical activity
element.notes: Lesions lead to persistent vegetative state

element.name: Parafascicular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Stimulation of acetylcholine release in dorsal striata
element.notes: Part of ascending activating system

element.name: Lateral Parafascicular Thalamic Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Lateral_part_of_the_parafascicular_thalamic_nucleus Lateral part of the parafascicular thalamic nucleus]

element.name: Dorsal Midline Nuclear Group of Thalamus
Paratenial Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Gateway for multimodal information to limbic system used in selecting appropriate responses
element.notes: Projects to BNST, AM, OMPFC, ET; Direct behavior toward a particular outcome over a range of outcomes

element.name: Paraventricular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Direct behavior toward a particular outcome over a range of outcomes
element.notes: Projects like PT, but more to BNST, AM

element.name: Ventral Midline Nuclear Group of Thalamus
Reuniens Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Gate information between OMPFC and HC dependent upon attentive/arousal states
element.notes: Regulate amount of neural traffic with changes in attentiveness

element.name: Rhomboidal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Communication of information across memory delays to guide memory responses
element.notes: like RE, return projection from PFC to HC, spatial working memory

element.name: Subfascicular Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Relays from PAG to Rhape nuclei, Inferior olive nucleus

element.comment: birds-only equivalent of Pulvinar for motion processing

element.name: Lateral Dorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From RSP L5,6 BA17,18, RT, LGN

element.name: Lateral Posterior Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From superior colliculus, pretectum

element.name: Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: Attention, planning, organization, abstract thinking, multi-tasking, and active memory
element.notes: Relay AM to FCA.LPFC, FCA.OMPFC

element.name: Medial Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.synonyms: Magnocellular Part of Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.function: relay emotional attention to orbitofrontal cortex
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_mediodorsal_nucleus Medial mediodorsal nucleus]; NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Magnocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]
element.notes: orbitofrontal cortex (BA12,13) defined by MDm projection; relay AM-Bp to OFC; OFCm - subjective pleasantness, OFCl - subjective unpleasantness

element.name: Central Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.synonyms: Densocellular Part of Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus, Paralaminar Part of Medial Dorsal Nucleus, Paralamellar Part of Medial Dorsal Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Paralaminar_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Paralaminar part of medial dorsal nucleus]; NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Densocellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Densocellular part of medial dorsal nucleus];
element.function: relay olfactory neocortex to insular integrated neocortex
element.notes: Relay piriform cortex (BA34) to AIC (BA14)

element.name: Lateral Mediodorsal Nucleus of Thalamus
element.synonyms: Parvicellular Part of Medial Dorsal Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_medial_dorsal_nucleus Parvicellular part of medial dorsal nucleus]
element.function: relay tegmentum to dorsal cingulate cortex
element.notes: Relay Superior Colliculus, TH-LD, LDTG, IPD to ACCdl

element.name: Limitans Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From SC, trigeminal nucleus, superior and inferior colliculus

element.name: Suprageniculate Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: From tectum, somatic sensations

element.name: Submedial Nucleus of Thalamus
element.notes: Projections from SC Lamina I, trigeminal nucleus to ACC

element.name: Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.function: Relay BGA.SN, BGA.GPI, FCA.OMPFC, FCA.CG to MCA.PMC, MCA.SMC
element.notes: Cognitive motor

element.name: Magnocellular Part of Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Magnocellular_part_of_ventral_anterior_nucleus Magnocellular part of ventral anterior nucleus]

element.name: Parvicellular Part of Ventral Anterior Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Parvicellular_part_of_ventral_anterior_nucleus Parvicellular part of ventral anterior nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.notes: Executive motor

element.name: Caudal Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Caudal_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Caudal part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Medial Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Medial_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Medial part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Oral Part of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Oral_part_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Oral part of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Pars Postrema of Ventral Lateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Pars_postrema_of_ventral_lateral_nucleus Pars postrema of ventral lateral nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Posteroinferior Nucleus
element.function: Relays pain and temperature from body to insula

element.name: Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.function: Relays somatic information from body to S1

element.name: Caudal Part of Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Caudal_part_of_ventral_posterolateral_nucleus Caudal part of ventral posterolateral nucleus]

element.name: Oral Part of Ventral Posterolateral Nucleus
element.refs: NL:[http://neurolex.org/wiki/Category:Oral_part_of_ventral_posterolateral_nucleus Oral part of ventral posterolateral nucleus]

element.name: Ventral Posteromedial Nucleus
element.function: Relays somatic information from face to S1
